vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
μόδιος, ὁ,
= Latin modius, a dry measure, = 1/6 μέδιμνος, for which it is falsa lectio in [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__2 vessel of this capacity, [NT]
__II a measure of length, = 200 ὀργυιαί, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: large bowl (holds about eight dry quarts)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
large bowl (holds about eight dry quarts)
a modius, a Roman measure for things dry, containing 16 sextarii, and equivalent to about a peck (8.75 liters); in NT a corn measure, Mt. 5:15; Mk. 4:21; Lk. 11:33*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: cesto, balde (un contenedor para medir grano de alrededor de 8 cuartos de galón o 7,5 litros)
